Stem: Purplish, erect, smooth, and shortly branched near top. Glandular hairy when young.
Leaves: Oppositely arranged, dark green, diamond shaped 3-12 cm long with small stiff hairs and toothed edges.
Flowers: In cluster of 40-50 small white daisy flowers.
FruitSeeds: Small seed like capsules, dark brown to black, angular, and with a ring of white hairs at top.
DistinguishingFeatures: Distinguished from mistflower by upright habit.
